thing-type.label: TZ06 In Wall Dual Relay(1 Way) Switch Module 2x 1.5kW
thing-type.description: In Wall Dual Relay(1 Way) Switch Module 2x 1.5kW<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThis in-wall switch module is a transceiver which is a Z-Wave Plus™ enabled device and is fully compatible with any Z-Wave enabled network.</p&gt <p&gtMini size design let the module can easily hide itself into the wall box and that will be good for the house decoration.</p&gt <p&gtThere are many kind of application by using the module to switch Load On and Off, one main application is the light control.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtIn the front casing, there is an on/off button with LED indicator below which is to toggle switch on and off or carries out inclusion, exclusion, reset or association. When first power is applied, its LED flashes on and off alternately and repeatedly at 0.5 second intervals. It implies that it has not been assigned a node ID and start auto inclusion.</p&gt <p&gtPressing the Include button of TZ06 three times within 2 seconds will enter inclusion mode</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing the Include button of TZ06 three times within 2 seconds will enter exclusion mode</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtMains Powered Device. </p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Selected Relay
parameter.description: Selected Relay (Endpoint)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIf Controller not using Multi_Channel command class to access the endpoint of PAN06, you may configure the endpoint value to react the Basic Command Class</p&gt <p&gtRelay 1: Only Relay 1 can be controlled and configured<br /&gtRelay 2: Only Relay 2 can be controlled and configured<br /&gtRelay 1 &amp; 2: Both Relays can be controlled and configured</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: External Switch Mode
parameter.description: Change the External Switch (S1 &amp; S2) Mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtManual Switch S1 and S2 can be set to Edge mode or Pulse mode or Edge-Toggle mode, default value is Edge mode.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Restore Switch State
parameter.description: Restore Switch State after AC power loss<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhenever the AC Power return from lost, TZ06 will restore the Switch state which could be SWITCH OFF, LAST SWITCH STATE, SWITCH ON. The default setting is LAST SWITCH STATE.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_2
parameter.label: 4: Auto OFF Timer
parameter.description: Auto OFF Timer Countdown<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhenever TZ06 switches to ON, the auto OFF timer will begin to count down. After the time decreases to zero, it will switch to OFF automatically. However, if auto OFF timer is set to 0, the auto OFF function will be disabled. The default setting is 0.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: RF Command Mode
parameter.description: RF Command Mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhenever a Switch OFF command, BASIC_SET, BINARY_SWITCH_SET, SWITCH_ALL_OFF, is received, it could be interpreted as 4 variety of commands.</p&gt <p&gt5-0: Switch OFF: It switches to OFF State. The default setting is Switch OFF<br /&gt5-1: Ignore: The Switch OFF command will be ignored<br /&gt5-2: Switch Toggle: It switches to the inverse of current State<br /&gt5-3: Switch ON: It switches to ON state</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Existence of Endpoint 3
parameter.description: Existence of Endpoint 3<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Endpoint 3 of Multi-Channel Command Class is related to Relay 1 and Relay 2.</p&gt <p&gtIt may be redundant for the need to control Relay 1 or Relay 2 individually. When the existence of Endpoint 3 is set as 2, the endpoint 3 of Multi-Channel Command Class will be disabled. The default value is 1.</p&gt</p&gt
